name: Ghostret
description:
This is my first ever completed project and I'm hoping you all will like it.

Controls :

W,A,S,D or Arrow Buttons to move,

Left Mouse button to shoot,

Q or Left Shift to dash,

You can kill enemies by dashing into them,

Pick up golden souls drop from enemies to heal,

Be carefull,enemies and bullets can destroy golden souls,

Aim carefully,yor bullets can hit you,

If you has less heart your gost becomes angry and your speed will increse.
